lead_paragraph: Whether you're a master at step ball change or a first-time hoofer ready to strut your stuff, head over to The Kitchen tonight where the tap dancer, poet and "Bring in 'Da Noise Bring in 'Da Funk" alum Joseph Webb will be hosting "Shim Sham," a free and open jam tap session. Grab your shoes and join him and some of the city's most talented members of the tap community as they come together to show off their moves. Mr. Webb's quartet will provide the musical accompaniment.
